content.rendered: Rida Ashir is a member of the firm’s Corporate Commercial and IT/Tech practice groups and has extensive experience in assisting Swedish and foreign clients in legally complex assignments where contract law issues arise, with a particular focus on tech and IT in a broad sense, industrial co-operations and outsourcing projects, purchase and service agreements as well as sales and distribution agreements. Rida regularly assists the firm’s clients in connection with a variety of contract law issues and has extensive experience in reviewing, drafting and negotiating complex agreements, as well as handling issues that arise during the contract period and the ongoing contract administration. Rida also has broad experience of assisting clients in tech- and IT-intensive M&A transactions and carve-outs. Rida also regularly lectures to students at the Faculty of Law at Lund University on commercial contract law and to clients in various contexts.
